data.name: Tap Ninja - Idle game
data.detailed_description:
Roadmap


About the Game



Start your adventure as a Ninja in this incremental game, destroy incoming enemies with a well-timed Katana Slash, increase your Speed Step combo to multiply your gold and build up your own village.

Start up from nothing and rise to a true Ninja Master status.

Key Features

  • Destroy incoming enemies, collect coins, earn gold
  • Build up your village to earn even more gold even while you are offline!
  • Buy Research Upgrades to increase your power
  • Ascend and learn epic and permanent Skill Upgrades
  • Challenge levels to perfect
  • Unlock hundreds of Achievements
  • Unlock characters and customize them with dyes
  • Crossplatform cloud saving - take your game on the go!

Roadmap for future:

  • More Upgrades and Ascension Skills
  • More Achievements
  • Quests
  • Collectable Pets
  • Conquest mode
  • Forgeable Artifacts
  • Your idea? Share it on the Discord

data.short_description: Destroy enemies, earn gold, upgrade your village, become a Ninja Master!
data.supported_languages: English, French, German, Japanese, Korean, Portuguese - Brazil, Simplified Chinese, Russian, Greek, Thai, Norwegian, Portuguese, Swedish, Vietnamese, Finnish, Romanian, Polish, Hungarian, Spanish - Latin America, Dutch, Spanish - Spain, Bulgarian, Traditional Chinese, Turkish, Czech, Italian, Danish, Ukrainian

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows Vista, 7, 8, or 10
  • Processor: Intel Dual-Core Duo 2.6GHz or faster processor
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.6
  • Processor: Intel Dual-Core Duo 2.6GHz or faster processor
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Storage: 150 MB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Ubuntu 10.10+, Mint 17.1+
  • Processor: Intel Dual-Core Duo 2.6GHz or faster processor
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
